entry.title: Circe Necklace
entry.summary:
Vendor: temerity jewelry
Type: necklace
Price: 125.00 - 135.00 (16 variants)

three pointed pendants with central bezels containing hand-crushed stone inlay, curved and held by a 16" sterling silver chain.

available in combinations of stone inlay- please specify in notes when ordering.  choose from lapis, turquoise, jet, coral, malachite, kyanite, amethyst, tiger's eye.  for custom stone inquiries, contact orders@temerityjewelry.com

entry.title: Fractus Earrings
entry.summary:
Vendor: temerity jewelry
Type:
Price: 80.00 - 90.00 (2 variants)

tiny coil stud earrings, measuring just under half an inch long.

hand carved from wax and cast in brass or sterling silver, with sterling silver posts and backings.

entry.title: Vincula Ring
entry.summary:
Vendor: temerity jewelry
Type:
Price: 98.00 - 122.00 (24 variants)

triple banded ring adorned with a triple vertical binding.  hand carved in wax and cast in brass or sterling silver.

*also available in men's sizes.  please contact us at orders@temerityjewelry.com for custom sizing.

entry.title: Pleko Collar
entry.summary:
Vendor: temerity jewelry
Type:
Price: 165.00 - 235.00 (2 variants)

braided torc with gently pointed ends, the pleko collar is braided by hand and cast in brass or sterling silver.  can be worn with the opening at the front, enhancing the clavicle and sitting beautifully around the neck.  

slightly curved and adjustable.  measures 12 inches around with a 3 inch opening.

entry.title: Spirea Hair Stick
entry.summary:
Vendor: temerity jewelry
Type:
Price: 118.00 - 140.00 (2 variants)

twisted hair stick with a coiled barb, the spirea hair stick measures just under five inches long.  hand carved in wax and cast in brass or sterling silver, its slightly curved shape will hold even the thickest hair securely.

entry.title: Treccia Hairpin
entry.summary:
Vendor: temerity jewelry
Type:
Price: 118.00 - 140.00 (2 variants)

the double pronged treccia hairpin measures 4 inches long with a slightly curved shape to hold even the thickest hair securely.  braided and carved in wax and cast in brass or sterling silver, it's the perfect adornment to your every day messy up-do.

entry.title: Lyrata Hairpin
entry.summary:
Vendor: temerity jewelry
Type:
Price: 118.00 - 140.00 (2 variants)

the double pronged lyrata hairpin measures 4 inches long with a slightly curved shape to hold even the thickest hair securely.  twisted by hand in wax and cast in brass or sterling silver, it's the perfect adornment to your every day messy up-do.

entry.title: Lykos Earrings
entry.summary:
Vendor: temerity jewelry
Type:
Price: 95.00 - 120.00 (16 variants)

tiny textured, pointed studs with a central bezel of handcrushed stone inlay.  studs measure just under half an inch long.  

available in brass or sterling silver.  for custom stone options please message us at orders@temerityjewelry.com.

entry.title: Bette Earrings
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: earrings
Price: 140.00 - 160.00 (12 variants)

a pair of petite braided earrings, each adorned with a center bezel set stone.  each braid measures 1.5" long.

braided by hand and cast in brass or sterling silver- choose from green aventurine, turquoise, sodalite, rose quartz, carnelian, or hematite.  for custom stones, please email us at orders@temerityjewelry.com

entry.title: Braid Inlay Bangle
entry.summary:
Vendor: temerity jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 96.00 - 124.00 (12 variants)

an update to our best selling slice inlay bangle, the braid inlay bangle's delicate twists clutch a pod of inlaid stones.  braided by hand and cast in either brass or sterling silver, with inlay of turquoise, jet, lapis, coral, or malachite.

each bangle measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.

entry.title: Staircase Hoops - Medium
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: earrings
Price: 82.00 - 125.00 (3 variants)

the ultimate throwback- open hoop earrings with a finely detailed braided staircase design.  braided by hand and cast in brass or sterling silver, both with sterling silver posts and backings.  also available in 14k gold plate.

hoops measure 1.5" in diameter.  see our large hoops here.

entry.title: Artemis Collar
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: necklace
Price: 195.00 - 280.00 (2 variants)

the artemis collar is cast from a hand woven and knotted fishtail braid with a large central knot. a high polish finish draws out the detail, texture and variations of the original material; its shape recalls the bow of artemis, greek goddess of the hunt.  tough and delicate in equal measure, curving beautifully against the neck.

finished with a 6" braided waxed cotton cord, mirroring the collar's design, and a hand forged hook clasp. opening measures 5" across. available in brass or sterling silver.

entry.title: Rika Ring
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: rings
Price: 88.00 - 98.00 (10 variants)

we scaled down our iona bangle to make its little sister, the rika ring.  inspired by the ephemeral nature of textiles & weaving, the rika ring is cast from a hand woven rope fishtail braid with a large central knot.  a high polish finish draws out the texture and variations of the original material.

for custom sizing, please email us at orders@temerityjewelry.com

entry.title: Plait Cuff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 90.00

inspired by the ephemeral nature of textiles & weaving, the plait cuff is cast from a combination of hand-braided and tied ropes. a high polish finish draws out the texture and variations of the original material.

slightly oval, with a 1" opening and an approximate 7.5" diameter.

entry.title: Thea Necklace
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: necklace
Price: 94.00 - 108.00 (10 variants)

a petite double braid necklace adorned with a center bezel set stone, on a delicate 16" sterling silver chain to lay across the collarbones.  

braided by hand and cast it in brass or sterling silver- choose from green aventurine (pictured), sodalite, turquoise, carnelian, or hematite.  for custom stones, please email us at orders@temerityjewelry.com

entry.title: Edge Ring
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: rings
Price: 88.00 - 109.00 (10 variants)

sculpturally carved by hand in wax and cast in brass or sterling silver, the edge ring gradually curves from a flat, wide plane to a narrow knife edge.  we love this style worn on the index finger with the narrow edge out.  

for custom sizing, please email us at orders@temerityjewelry.com

entry.title: Staircase Hoops - Large
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: earrings
Price: 92.00 - 138.00 (3 variants)

the ultimate throwback- open hoop earrings with a finely detailed braided staircase design.  braided by hand and cast in brass or sterling silver, both with sterling silver posts and backings.  also available in 14k gold plate.

hoops measure 2.5" in diameter.  see our medium hoops here.

entry.title: Slice Bangle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 82.00 - 110.00 (12 variants)

we've taken our bestselling slice inlay rings to the next level with these delicately textured inlay bangles.  available in brass or sterling silver, we love the look, feel, and beautiful tinkling sound of them stacked up in a combination of jet, lapis, kyanite and malachite crushed stone inlay.   

sold individually- also available in a set of two here. each bangle measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.

entry.title: Slice Bangle Set
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 150.00 - 205.00 (72 variants)

we've taken our bestselling slice inlay rings to the next level with these delicately textured inlay bangles.  available in brass or sterling silver, we love the look, feel, and beautiful tinkling sound of them stacked up in a combination of jet, coral, lapis, kyanite and malachite crushed stone inlay.   

available in a set of two, or individually here. each bangle measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.

entry.title: Box Braid Cuff
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 95.00

we've taken the traditional box braid bracelet and updated it in cuff form.  

braided by hand from leather cord and cast in brass, the cuff has a high polished finish to show off the natural variations in the cording.  the exterior maintains the rough hewn texture of the original material, while the interior of the cuff has been polished smooth for comfort & ease of wear every day.

the box braid cuff is slighly oval with a 1" opening and a 2" diameter.

entry.title: Rhiannon Ring
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: rings
Price: 115.00 - 135.00 (56 variants)

woven by hand and cast in brass or sterling silver, the rhiannon ring elegantly wraps around your finger with a bezel set stone as its focal point and a gently pointed tail at the other end.  

available in sodalite (pictured), turquoise, aventurine, or carnelian.  please email us at orders@temerityjewelry.com for custom stone or sizing information.

entry.title: Iona Bangle
entry.summary:
Vendor: Temerity Jewelry
Type: bracelet
Price: 94.00

inspired by the ephemeral nature of textiles & weaving, the iona bangle is cast from a hand woven and knotted fishtail braid.  a high polish finish draws out the texture and variations of the original material.  it's the perfect addition to an armful of bangles for summertime and a modern update to the traditional friendship bracelet.

measures 8" around with a 2.5" diameter.
